text: seonjajayeo midneun yeoseongdeul-i geu daeege wa hananimgwa eotteon geosdo bi yuhaji anihago humchiji anihamyeo gan-eumhaji anihago jasigdeul-eul salhae haji anihamyeo seuseulo heowileul jo jaghayeo jungsanghaji anihago geudaeui il-e geoyeoghaji anihal geos-inila malhan geunyeodeul-ui maengseleul bad-adeuli la geuligo geunyeodeul-eul wihae hananimkkeyongseoleul guhala sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong-gwa jabilo chungmanhasinila
